bonzai.api

Class Hat

  • java.lang.Object
    • bonzai.api.Actor
      • bonzai.api.Hat

  • public class Hat
extends Actor
    Hats are Actors and your only source of point generation. When a Hat is on a players base (with the exception of neutral hats), it starts generating mana and points. When an Enemy Wizard casts magic on a Hat you own, they gain control of it. However, if your Wizard casts magic on a Hat you own but do not control, the Hat is sent back to your base.
    See Also:
    getOwner(), AIGameState.getRogueHats()

    • Method Detail

      • getOwner

        public int getOwner()

        Gets the team number that owns this actor. Note that for hats, this will not necessarily be the same as the team that owns it. Most of the time, you will want to know the controller instead, found in getTeam().

        The player team numbers starts at 1.
        A neutral unit will return a value of 0.

        Returns:
        The team number of the given Actor. Also, returns -1 if the Actor cannot be seen.
        See Also:
        Actor.getTeam()
